name: Virtual Lean Coffee ☕️
description:
Run structured but agenda-less engaging meetings with confidence, taking advantage of the Lean Coffee meeting approach.


"Lean Coffee is a structured, but agenda-less meeting. Participants gather, build an agenda, and begin talking. Conversations are directed and productive because the agenda for the meeting was democratically generated."

– leancoffee.org


Check the facilitator tips and extra resources I added to this template. I am a fan of the "Together alone" approach, but I found Lean coffee a great fit for follow-up workshops or whenever a group needs to engage into discussing pressing topics.


I hope you will find it useful. I can't wait to hear how you will be using this template. Please leave a comment below with any questions or feedback.


Happy meeting ✌️
